review: At the outset, I would say that Dr. Chintan Doshi is a very efficient doctor in his profession. My foot was fractured and doctor plastered my foot and within 21 days my plaster was removed and doctor advised me to take rest for 2 weeks. Today, I am walking as usual and there is no pain. Due to his efforts, I started walking without surgery. I would recommend everyone to visit Dr. Chintan Doshi and take his opinion on any orthopaedic problems. ** ** *** ** *** **** ******* ** *** *************
reply_text: Thank you for your valuable feedback.

review:
Dr Chintan doshi ** **** ********** ************ ******* he has operated my 11 yr son (left forearm surgery) very successfully

He explains the treatment before surgery, which gives us a confidence,as we are very sensitive when any situation arises of surgery of our children

His follow up treatment is also excellent & Never misguide any body
reply_text: Thank you. Hope your son is doing great now..

review:
*** ******* *** ** ** ***** ******** ******* *** ****** *** ******* **** ****** ** * **** His treating methods are too much helpful. His extremely supportive nature helped me to improve my ward's health , he was there to help me at any time. 
I am really thankful to him for helping me out in every situation. He is one of the greatest doctor I have ever seen. I am really grateful to share my amazing experience with him.
reply_text: Thank you for your valuable feedback

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I will never recommend Dr Chintan .*** ** **** *** ******** ** **** **** ********* **  My husband had a hairline fracture. After tying the fracture the case got complicated , i called him up as my husband started with uneasiness and breathlessness and ended up with Compartment Syndrome with heavy bacterial infection..I called  Dr Chintan to tell all this things but he never turned up.. He was hospitalized for 40 days and had gone through 7 surgery. ** **** *** ******* ******* *** ** ** ********* ***** ********* ******** *** ******** *******

Bad service. Guys trust me just like you I searched on google and went to this place. *** *** ***** ***** ** *** ********* ***** **** *** ********* *** **** *** *** ******* *** **** ******** ******* *** *** **** ***** I went to do 2D echo and colour Doppler of heart'. The doctor saw the patient ( my mom) did the necessary things and Just left in 15 mins without even informing us. When ever you ask some imp questions to the girls after the doctor left, they just say the same thing  again and again that ( He is a specialist doctor and he has other things to do. ) *** like  yeah we are also spending 2500-3000rs just to get this service from you guys . **** * **** ** ********* ***** *** **** ****** ******* **** ** ***. I strongly recommend don't spend your precious money, time, efforts and your day at this place! ü§¶
** *** * ****  **** ****** *** he explains everything  otherwise and well and his follow up is very good .I recommend  the doctorüëçüëç
Excellent , my daughter was in great pain . Doctor was always available when called , which was very relieving.Thank you .
reply_text: Thanks. I hope everything is fine..

review: He is a very approachable n friendly doctor who listens to your issues and with patience gives answer to all your queries and makes you comfortable.I will highly recommend him .He is an excellent doctor .
Very helpful doctor . Gives proper guidelines . I recommend him . Doctor will not charge much . Will gives medicine only if required .
reply_text: Thank you for your valuable feedback

review:
It was nice that doctor have treated me Specially coming for me by appointment in this situation on time (07.04.2020) even 2nd visit for regular checkup by giving appointment 
Thanks
reply_text: Thank you for your feedback. I wish you complete recovery from your severe injury.
